fullText: Mia Farrow and Patti LuPone bring their considerable star power to Jen Silverman's two-hander about unlikely friendship between a sheltered Iowa housewife and her mysterious new roommate.
dtliExcerpt: Mia Farrow and Patti LuPone bring their considerable star power to Jen Silverman's two-hander about unlikely friendship between a sheltered Iowa housewife and her mysterious new roommate.
